data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Suining to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Suining, Sichuan, China

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Suining words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 166,433 who are far from you in Suining, Sichuan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 13,905 believers in Suining, Sichuan, China a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Deng, Geman people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Deng, Geman people know you.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Suining, Sichuan, China to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Suining
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Suining, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Suining
location.people_groups_list: Naru, Chrame, Naza, Naxi, Northern, Namuyi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Naru (16,000), Chrame (51,000), Naza (1,800), Naxi, Northern (3,400), Namuyi (8,900)
